com.siperian.sif.message

Class TrustSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.TrustSetting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TrustSetting
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the trust settings that define a trust decay curve or a high confidence trust.

    A trust setting is defined for a trust-enabled column for a particular system.

    It can also be used to specify a custom trust override in a PutRequest for a trust-enabled field. The default trust settings for this field can be overridden by using a TrustOverrideField rather than a Field in the PutRequest Record. For more details, see PutRequest.

    See Also:
    TrustGraphType, TrustTimeUnit, Serialized Form

      • isCustom

        public boolean isCustom()
        Returns true for a custom trust setting or false for a high confidence trust setting.

        Returns:
        True = custom, False = high confidence

      • setCustom

        public void setCustom(boolean custom)
        Sets whether this is a custom trust setting or a high confidence trust setting.

        Parameters:
        custom - True = custom, False = high

      • setMaximumTrust

        public void setMaximumTrust(int maximumTrust)
        Sets the initial (maximum) trust value. This is the value before any decay.

        Parameters:
        maximumTrust - Maximum (initial) trust value.

        See Also:
        setMinimumTrust(int)

      • createTrustSettingHigh

        public static TrustSetting createTrustSettingHigh()
        Creates a high confidence trust setting.

        This method uses the minimum trust and the maximum trust from the Admin system. The remaining data profile is from the source data.

      • createTrustSettingCustom

        public static TrustSetting createTrustSettingCustom(int trust,
                                                    int minimumTrust,
                                                    TrustTimeUnit timeUnit,
                                                    int maximumTimeUnits,
                                                    TrustGraphType graphType)
        Creates a custom trust setting based on the specified settings.

        Parameters:
        trust - Trust value (maximum) before decay. Must be between 1 and 100.
        minimumTrust - Fully decayed (minimum) trust value. Must be between 0 and trust.
        timeUnit - Time unit for trust decay curve.
        maximumTimeUnits - Number of time units over which trust decays.
        graphType - Type of trust decay curve.

        Returns:
        Always returns a custom TrustSetting.

      • createFromEncodedString

        public static TrustSetting createFromEncodedString(String encodedTrustSetting)
        Creates a trust setting object from an encoded trust string. Throws a NumberFormatException if the encodedTrustSetting cannot be converted to a Long value.

        Parameters:
        encodedTrustSetting - String representing the trust setting.

        Returns:
        A custom or high confidence TrustSetting.

        See Also:
        getAsEncodedString()

      • getAsEncodedString

        public String getAsEncodedString()
        Gets a String representing this trust setting in its standard format, which is a number represented as a string wrapped with a "\O" and "\".

        Returns:
        Trust String representing the trust setting.

        See Also:
        getAsEncodedStringNoWrapper()

      • getAsEncodedStringNoWrapper

        public String getAsEncodedStringNoWrapper()
        Gets a String that encodes the trust setting without the "\O...\" wrapper.

        Returns:
        Unwrapped String representing the trust setting.

        See Also:
        getAsEncodedString()
